Articles.Content:
Hello,

A little while back I saw a mod for showing you when you was in a situation where you could harvest new science. 

A on-the-fly "hey you can gather science now". Having started a new science game (with TAC and high re-entry heat to try something new from my 100% un-modded normal career mode) this would be really useful. 

I cannot remember what it was called though.

Names or links greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

- Ceq.

> 
> You might be looking for [ScienceAlert](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76793-1-0-2-ScienceAlert-1-8-7-Experiment-availability-feedback-%28May-4%29).

That's the one! Thank you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
